impressumDisclaimer: Despite careful content control, I assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.
impressumCopyright: The content and works created by the site operator on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Contributions by third parties are marked as such.

datenschutzIntro: This website does not collect or store any personal data. No cookies are set and no tracking is used.
datenschutzContact: If you send me inquiries by e-mail, your details from the e-mail, including the contact details you provide there, will be stored for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. I will not pass on this data without your consent.
datenschutzLog: The provider of these pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits. This data cannot be assigned to specific persons. This data is not merged with other data sources.
datenschutzRights: You have the right at any time to free information about your stored personal data, its origin and recipient and the purpose of data processing as well as a right to correction, blocking or deletion of this data.
